body:
Implemented **Watched Folders** feature for persistent repository discovery.

## What's New

### Settings UI
- New "Watched Folders" section in Settings ? General
- Add/remove folders to watch for new repositories
- Persisted across app restarts

### Repository Sidebar
- Right-click a folder group ? "Watch Folder" to start monitoring
- Right-click a watched folder ? "Stop Watching" to stop monitoring
- Eye icon (??) shows which folders are being watched

### Auto-Discovery
- Uses FileSystemWatcher to detect new `.git` directories in real-time
- Debounced events (500ms) to handle git clone's rapid file creation
- On app startup, scans watched folders for repos added while app was closed

### Files Changed
- `src/Leaf/Services/IFolderWatcherService.cs` - Interface
- `src/Leaf/Services/FolderWatcherService.cs` - Implementation
- `src/Leaf/Services/SettingsService.cs` - Added WatchedFolders to AppSettings
- `src/Leaf/Models/RepositoryGroup.cs` - Added IsWatched property
- `src/Leaf/ViewModels/MainViewModel.cs` - Wired up FolderWatcherService
- `src/Leaf/Views/SettingsDialog.xaml/.cs` - Settings UI
- `src/Leaf/Views/RepositoryListView.xaml` - Visual indicator + context menu
- `tests/Leaf.Tests/Services/FolderWatcherServiceTests.cs` - 18 unit tests
